body:
Add new version of gmsh to the packages, including
```
4.5.5
4.5.6
4.6.0
4.7.0
4.7.1
```

In addition, a patch file is added for version 4.7.1 to the build error when `CGNS` option `CGNS_SCOPE_ENUMS` is on.
See [gmsh issue 1108](https://gitlab.onelab.info/gmsh/gmsh/-/issues/1108) and  [commit b0b3ece](https://gitlab.onelab.info/gmsh/gmsh/-/commit/b0b3ece698718bf1a79f50778d24d51c207f8727)
title: Add new versions of gmsh
